publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2244 Nicol Stephen: Railways Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that those provisions that confer executive powers and functions on the Scottish Ministers in the Railways Bill and those that relate to devolved matters should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-2244 Nicol Stephen: Railways Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that those provisions that confer executive powers and functions on the Scottish Ministers in the Railways Bill and those that relate to devolved matters should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Tavish Scott
